general.title: General
general.concordDesc1: Concord Network is a separate distributed consensus network that extends the core functionality of Concrnt. You can enable it under the following terms.
general.concordDesc2: Concord Network is currently in preview. The network may be reset or changed without notice, and any data on the network may be lost and will not be restored.
general.concordDesc3: Concord Network provides a point feature for fun, but under no circumstances can points be exchanged for cash or any other valuable items, including but not limited to currency exchange or swaps with other cryptocurrencies.
general.autoSwitchMediaPostType: Automatically switch the post type when an image is attached
general.inviteNote: If your domain is invitation-only, you need to have invitation privileges. Please contact your domain administrator for more details.
general.addMuteWordDesc: Mute words are case-insensitive and can be used to hide posts containing specific words.
general.stripExif: Compress images and remove EXIF information when posting

alias.completed: An alias {{ alias }} has been set for your account.
alias.uncompleted: Account alias is not set (can only be set in privileged mode)
alias.description: If you own a domain, you can set an alias for your account by creating the following TXT record.
alias.verifySuccess: Alias settings have been verified successfully.
alias.verifyFailed: Failed to verify alias settings. Please check your DNS configuration.

switchMasterToSub.mailHerf: mailto:?subject=concrnt secret&body=**Set the recipient of this email to yourself and send it.**%0D%0A%0D%0A=== Identification Info ===%0D%0AIdentifier: {{ ccid }}%0D%0AMaster Key: {{ mnemonic }}%0D%0A================%0D%0A%0D%0A%0D%0AThe master key is the only passphrase that proves you own the account identified by this identifier.%0D%0AIf this key becomes known to a malicious third party, the security of this account will be compromised, and you will need to take steps to freeze the account yourself.%0D%0A%0D%0AThe master key will be used for important operations such as migrating your account or recovering lost sub-keys.%0D%0AUntil then, store it securely, such as by printing it and keeping it in a safe deposit box.%0D%0A
switchMasterToSub.aboutMasterKey:
The master-key is the only passphrase that proves you are the owner of the account identified by this identifier.
If this key becomes known to a malicious third party, the security of this account will be compromised, and you will need to take steps to freeze the account yourself.
The master-key will be used for important operations such as migrating your account or recovering lost sub-keys. Until then, keep it stored in a secure and reliable way, such as printing it and keeping it in a safe.
switchMasterToSub.name: Name
switchMasterToSub.addition: The reference information is from when this certificate was issued and may have changed since then.
switchMasterToSub.testPrompt: To proceed, enter the {{first}}th and {{second}}th words of your master key
switchMasterToSub.privilegeModeDesc: Privileged Mode allows for critical actions such as account deletion.

passkey.completedDesc: You can now log in to Concrnt using your passkey. Registering a new passkey will still require your master key. Please keep your master key stored in a safe place.
passkey.failed: Your passkey does not support required extensions ðŸ˜­
passkey.failedDesc: Please try another passkey, or wait until your current passkey supports the required extensions. Unfortunately, you will need to delete the created passkey manually.
passkey.warnTitle: Passkey registration is only supported by limited applications
passkey.warnDesc: Concrnt uses advanced passkey extensions, which are not yet supported by all passkey providers. Currently, iCloud Passwords (Safari) and 1Password have been confirmed to work. However, passkeys managed by Chrome are not yet supported. Since this is a globally developing feature, there is no way to know whether a given passkey is supported until registration is attempted. If the passkey turns out to be unsupported, you will need to manually discard it.
passkey.desc: Registering a passkey allows for easier login to Concrnt. If you lose your passkey, you will need your master key to recover access. Please make sure to keep your master key securely stored.

media.title: Media
media.afterRegisteringImgur: After registering with Imgur, go to

descs.domain: Domain Storage refers to the storage provided by this domain. It can be used without any setup, but there is a maximum capacity set. Additionally, the list of files may be viewed by administrators and files that violate the terms may be deleted.
descs.imgur: Imgur is used for image uploads. It can be set up relatively easily. The content that can be uploaded is subject to Imgur's terms.
descs.s3: S3 is used for image uploads. S3-compatible services like CloudFlare R2 can also be used. It requires more effort to set up, but allows you to keep files under your own control. Charges may apply depending on the service, but in most cases, it will fit within the free tier.

ap.domainSelectionWarningDesc2: While Concrnt accounts can freely return to their original domain, ActivityPub integration, due to specifications,

welcome.arrivalTimelineDescription: Welcome to the ariake.concrnt.net server! If you have any questions, feel free to post here.
welcome.devCentralDescription: A place for developers to relax
welcome.metaDescription: Concrnt is a new era SNS that enriches your world just a little bit.
welcome.catch: What if there was an SNS like this...
welcome.wish1: You could know in real-time what your friends and people you're interested in are doing.
welcome.wish2: You could interact with multiple communities using a single account.
welcome.wish3: You could choose who manages the platform, rather than being controlled by a single entity.
welcome.wish4: Wouldn't it be great if there was such an SNS?
welcome.wish5: Concrnt was developed to fulfill this wish.
welcome.wish6: Welcome to the new era of SNS.
welcome.feature1subtitle: Tired of recommendation feeds filled with strangers?
welcome.feature1p1: Wouldn't you rather know more about the people you like than just seeing recommendations filled with strangers?
welcome.feature1p2: With Concrnt, instead of relying on algorithms, you can use customizable lists to access information that truly matters to you. Select the people you like and the communities you're interested in, and create a timeline that fits you perfectly.
welcome.feature1p3: Concrnt is an SNS focused on the connections that truly matter to you, making it enjoyable for everyone.
welcome.feature2subtitle: Say goodbye to the days of fearing account suspension ðŸ‘‹
welcome.feature2p1: Concrnt is a decentralized SNS that prioritizes user freedom and safety. It is free from the dictatorship of a single company or organization, with independent individuals and organizations running their own servers.
welcome.feature2p2: This means you no longer have to live in fear of your account being suddenly suspended. Even if you experience unfair treatment on one server, you can easily move to another server, retaining your posts and followers, and continue your activities. Here, you'll find the security and freedom of being able to manage your account in a way that was unimaginable with conventional SNS.
welcome.feature2p3: On Concrnt, your account truly belongs to you.
welcome.feature3subtitle: The era of using separate accounts for different interests is over
welcome.feature3p1: On Concrnt, in addition to the home timeline, you can switch between multiple community timelines. When posting, you can simultaneously share across multiple communities, making it easy to connect loosely with multiple communities, which is natural for humans.
welcome.feature3p2: It's not about being overly connected to the world like X, nor is it about being too closed off like Discord. The charm of Concrnt is that you can find your place while moderately connecting with other communities.
welcome.crnt1: Itâ€™s a new way of using SNS, but once you get used to it, it's comfortable!
welcome.crnt2: What I depend on must be open!
welcome.crnt3: I want to broadcast to multiple communities simultaneously!
welcome.crnt4: Maybe Iâ€™ll try setting up my own server?
welcome.crnt5: I want a decentralized SNS where I donâ€™t have to be decentralized!
welcome.crnt11:
Because my account is truly in my own hands,
I can use it confidently as my internet identity.
welcome.crnt12: Communicating with emoji reactions is so smooth!
welcome.crnt13:
Even if the server Iâ€™m on shuts down,
I can easily move my relationships to a new server, so no worries!

home.title: Home
home.crnt1: I really love the quietness at this time. Solo time on holidays is the best.
home.crnt2: Speaking of music, lately I can't get anime songs out of my head. They really pump me up.
home.crnt3: Afternoon music selectionâ€”what should I listen to today? It's a tough choice.
home.crnt4: A new book has arrived! Time to brew some tea and dive into it. The perfect holiday.
home.crnt5: It's been a while, but they're rerunning my favorite anime today. Time to relax and watch.

game.title: Gaming Scene
game.crnt1: Lost my save data in 'Adventurers of the Netherworld'... I want to cry.
game.crnt2: The new VR game is incredibly realistic! I need to be careful not to get dizzy.
game.crnt3: Last night's online battle was flawless teamwork. Let's do it again, team!
game.crnt4: Found an old arcade game. The feeling of inserting a coin and playing is so nostalgic.
game.crnt5: Collecting game OSTs is my hobby. I got a new one today!

food.title: Food
food.crnt1: Trying my hand at homemade vegan dishes. Today, it's tomato and quinoa salad.
food.crnt2: Discovered a new spice shop! Time to experiment with some exotic flavors.
food.crnt3: Today's ramen was exceptional. The spice level was just right.
food.crnt4: Homemade cold brew, a summer staple. The choice of coffee beans is key.
food.crnt5: The yakitori I had at the restaurant was crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside. Next time, I'm bringing friends!

welcome.title: Let's Create Your Concrnt Account!
welcome.desc2: Choose a server to sign up.
welcome.info1: On Concrnt, there are no barriers between servers. It's like choosing a mobile carrier.
welcome.info2: You can move between servers anytime, so if you have no preference, we recommend letting us choose for you.

chooseDomain.tips: Tips: If you're setting up your own server, click here

createProfile.title: Creating a Profile
createProfile.desc: Here you set your name, icon, and self-introduction.

authorize.loginRequired: You need to log in before authorizing the application.
authorize.loginNotice: By pressing the login button, you prove to {{appName}} that you are Concrnt user {{userName}}, but the application will not have permission to post or view on your behalf.

import.qrHint: You can get a login QR code from 'Settings > Login QR' on a logged-in device.
import.notFound: Your server could not be found. You can continue by entering it manually.
import.invalidSecret: The secret code is not correct.
import.notFoundOnServer: Your account could not be found on the specified server.
import.connectionError: Could not connect to the specified server.
import.input: Enter the secret code or private key
import.masterKeyDesc: Enter the master key as 12 words separated by spaces
import.passkeyNoticeTitle: Passkey login is now available ðŸŽ‰
import.passkeyNoticeBody: After logging in with your master key using privileged login, you can register a passkey from the subkey management screen.
import.passkeyWarnTitle: Passkey login is currently in beta
import.passkeyWarnBody:
Due to potential spec changes, registered passkeys may become unusable in the future.
Additionally, concrnt.world relies on passkey extensions that are still in the process of being adopted globally. Some browsers may not support them yet, and even when they do, there may be limitationsâ€”such as lack of cross-platform login support.

Currently confirmed compatibility:
iCloud Keychain (Safari): Supported
1Password: Direct usage supported. Remote authentication via QR code is not supported
Google Chrome: Not supported

login.congrat: Successfully switched from privileged mode to normal mode! Well done!
login.block: Before proceeding, let's switch from privileged mode to normal mode.

password&login.title: Password & Login
password&login.desc1: Instead of deciding password on your own, you use a predefined password to log in. This password is extremely important and is referred to as the 'Master Key.' If your Master Key is exposed to others, it can lead to a permanent account takeover. Never share it with anyone.
password&login.desc2: Additionally, if you lose your Master Key, you will permanently lose access to your account. You'll need to create a new account in order to continue using the service. Therefore, make sure to print or write it down and store it securely, just like something valuable.
password&login.handsonDesc: Use the button below to securely save your Master Key in your preferred way.

howtologin.title: How to Log In
howtologin.desc1: To log in, enter your Master Key on the login page. Alternatively, you can also log in using QR code.
howtologin.desc2: On a device where you're already logged in, go to Settings > Login QR to display the QR code and scan it with a new device.

privmode.title: Privileged Mode
privmode.desc1: When you log in with your Master Key, you can access privileged mode. This mode allows you to perform critical operations such as account migration or deletion.
privmode.desc2: If privileged mode is not required, you can click 'Privileged Mode' at the top of the screen to remove sensitive information and switch to normal mode.
privmode.desc3: To switch back to privileged mode from normal mode, log out and log in with your Master Key.
privmode.handsonDesc: You'll be in privileged mode right after registration. Let's switch to normal mode.

post.title: Posting
post.desc: On desktop, the posting UI is located at the top of the screen by default. On smartphones, you can access the posting screen by pressing the button at the bottom right. Let's try making your first post.
post.syntax:
## Formatting and Preview

In , you can use symbols in your posts to apply formatting.
For example, typing `**bold**` will make the text **bold**.
You can check how your formatting looks in real-time using the preview at the bottom of the posting UI.

## Formatting Guide
- `# Heading`: Heading (size changes with the number of #)
- `**Bold**`: **Bold**
- `*Italic*`: *Italic*
- `~~Strikethrough~~`: ~~Strikethrough~~

follow&watch.desc:
# Follow & Watch

In , the concept of 'Follow' works differently compared to typical social media.
'Follow' in Concrnt is more like 'Add to Contacts.' Actively follow people you know or find interesting.

On the other hand, 'Watch' allows you to add someone to a specific list and view all their posts.

Since Concrnt is community-based, directly watching too many people can clutter your timeline. It's recommended to watch only those you're genuinely interested in.

community.title: Community
community.desc1: has community timelines that can be discovered via the 'Explore' tab. Find one and check it out. If there isn't one, consider creating your own.
community.desc2before: Once you find one, press the
community.desc2after: button to add the community to your list (watch it).

postToCommunity.title: Posting to a Community
postToCommunity.desc: Once you've added a community to your list, it will appear as an option in the posting UI. You can select multiple destinations for your post.

changeDefault.title: Setting a Default Posting Destination
changeDefault.descbefore: If you find a community to settle into, setting it as your default posting destination can be convenient. While viewing the list, press the
changeDefault.descafter: button at the top right to set your default posting destination.

list.goExplore: Find users and communities to follow
list.desc:
# Lists

Watching multiple communities can make your timeline too cluttered.
In such cases, create more lists to organize them.
You can access the list management screen from 'Lists' in the menu.

## Pinning Lists

From the list settings, you can pin specific lists. Pinned lists are always accessible from the tabs at the top of the screen.

## Lists as Presets

Lists in  are more than just collections; they serve as powerful presets.
For example, you can assign different default posting destinations to multiple lists, allowing you to switch between them quickly.

customize.desc:
# Advanced Usage

## App Installation
 uses PWA technology, enabling you to use this web page like a smartphone app.

<Illustration>

### Notification Settings

Installing the app lets you configure notifications. By default, all notifications are turned off, but you can enable them in Settings > General by pressing the 'Enable Notifications' button. Once enabled, you can customize which events trigger notifications.

Only one device can have notifications enabled at a time. Enabling notifications on a new device will disable them on the previous one.

## Customization

Concrnt offers a variety of customization features.
### Color Themes
You can change the color theme in the Settings > Theme menu. You can also create your own themes and share them. Shared themes appear on the timeline like this:
```theme
{"meta":{"name":"Olive","author":"con1t0tey8uxhkqkd4wcp4hd4jedt7f0vfhk29xdd2"},"palette":{"primary":{"main":"#292e24","contrastText":"#ffffff"},"secondary":{"main":"#265E2C"},"background":{"default":"#12a129","paper":"#fffcfa","contrastText":"#292e24"},"text":{"primary":"#292e24","secondary":"#265E2C","hint":"rgba(41, 46, 36, 0.5)","disabled":"rgba(41, 46, 36, 0.5)"},"divider":"rgba(41, 46, 36, 0.12)"},"components":{"MuiButton":{"defaultProps":{"variant":"contained","disableElevation":false}},"MuiPaper":{"defaultProps":{"variant":"elevation"}},"MuiAppBar":{"defaultProps":{"color":"primary"}}}}
```

Press the install button to instantly apply the theme.

### Emoji Packs

Concrnt allows you to use emojis in posts and reactions by installing emoji packs.
Shared emoji packs appear on the timeline like this:
<emojipack src="https://emojis.worldfile.cc/worldpack/emojis.json"></emojipack>

You can also create your own emoji packs, though it requires some effort. See [here](https://square.concrnt.net/misc/emojipack/) for details.

done.desc:
# Done!

You've now mastered the basics of using !

From here on, feel free to explore and use Concrnt however you like.
done.otherTips:
## Additional Tips

### For Password Manager Users & Frequent Logins

If you're using a password manager to log in to , it's recommended to use a Sub Key instead of the Master Key.
This is because:
1. Some password managers struggle with handling Japanese characters as passwords.
2. Logging in with the Master Key creates a new session.

You can copy your Sub Key from Settings > ID Management while logged in under normal mode. Sub Key login works via the same login screen as the Master Key, with a dedicated input field.

## Other Features

### Sub-Profiles
Concrnt lets you create multiple profiles. You can choose which profile to use when posting.

### ActivityPub Integration
By enabling ActivityPub integration, you can interact with other ActivityPub-compatible platforms (Mastodon, Misskey, Pleroma, etc.).

### Data Management & Migration
Concrnt is a decentralized SNS, allowing you to manage your own data.
To safeguard against server shutdowns, regularly export your data from Settings > Data Management and keep it securely.
You can also migrate to a different server if your current one shuts down.

details.twoPasswords: Concrnt has two types of passwords: a 'Master Key' and a 'Sub Key'.
details.sealAnalogy: This is like the relationship between a registered seal and a self-inking seal.
details.digitalSeal: In Concrnt, you stamp your posts with a digital seal to prove they are yours.
details.realSeal: A registered seal is used for contracts or withdrawing money from a bank, but you wouldn't use it to receive a package.
details.masterSubUsage: Similarly, in Concrnt, the Master Key is used for important actions like migration or account deletion, while the Sub Key is used for everyday actions like posting or following.
details.masterKeyWarning: If your Master Key is ever leaked, it's over, but you can always revoke a Sub Key.

community.timelineDescription: Welcome to Concrnt! This is the main timeline for beginners to find their community. If you're unsure, try adding this timeline to your list.

emergency.title: Crash Report
emergency.whenToUseTools: If reloading doesnâ€™t help after 3 tries â†“
emergency.softReset: Reset everything except login info and reload
emergency.recoverTheme: Reset theme and launch with sync disabled
emergency.hardReset: Reset everything (login info will also be lost)
emergency.supportDesc: If reloading doesn't resolve the issue, there may be a serious problem. Check the latest updates using the link below.
emergency.reportFailed: Failed to send report (Hint: This only works on official deployments)
messages: The internet is a wonderful place, but sometimes things go wrong. Try the buttons below.
Computers are mysterious. Reloading might fix the issue.
Strange things happen sometimes. Letâ€™s solve this together â€” try the buttons below.
The system hit a small bump. A retry might do the trick.
Something didnâ€™t go as planned. Try reloading.
Things might not be working correctly right now. Try reloading.
Oops! Something went wrong. Try reloading.
